target.name: nsis
target.echo: NSIS may fail if nsisant.jar is not visible to Ant and makensis is not in your path. To make the task visible you need to do one of two things depending on whether you are running ant in Eclipse or not. In Eclipse, add nsisant-*.jar to Preferences -> Ant -> Runtime -> Global Entries Otherwise, run the nsis.antlibs task to copy jars to ANT_HOME/lib
